nodes.text: Baron Garto was the male head of one the Nine Houses, the crime families that ruled the planet Shikaakwa, and a rival of Baron Volnos Ryo in Clan Ryo. Sometime before 25,793 BBY, Ryo dealt a blow against Garto, earning Garto's enmity, and in revenge Garto hired the Devaronian assassin Jaris Kan to kill Volnos Ryo, though Kan ultimately failed in his attempt.
Garto was first mentioned in Dawn of the Jedi: Force Storm 2, the second issue of the Star Wars: Dawn of the Jedi comic book series, though his species was not identified.
